website_summaries.verdict: A well-made set that provides ample storage and convenient features for a value price- the best deal available.
pros: Features 4 canister-style containers with redesigned seals that close effortlessly
We love their viewing windows that reminds you of the contents
cons: The set is basic, but practical for the budget-minded

customer_reviews.title: Well I see what everyone meant.
customer_reviews.text: Ran across several negative reviews concerning the lids of these canisters, but I decided to take a chance anyway. 2 out of 4 on the canisters (17 cup and 8 cup canisters) are perfect and give me no issues. The 12 cup canister lid is warped and has to be forced on. The 5 cup canister lid went on easily, but has too good of a seal, to the point where I broke a nail trying to remove the lid. I’m not sure if the lids warped in storage or if quality control just isn’t important anymore, but I wouldn’t recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Raven C.

customer_reviews.title: I have had the Tupperware canisters for 30 years and love them and am hoping hers will last as long
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and with no damage, but one lid was missing! Had to contact Amazon and after negotiations wound up with a three canister set instead of the four pieces I wanted. This was a gift for my daughter; I have had the Tupperware canisters for 30 years and love them and am hoping hers will last as long.
customer_reviews.author: OlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Hard plastic lids are not convenient!
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing extremely wrong with the Tupperware, as it is a product that I love; however, the “vintage” lids were a lot easier to press down than the “new” hard plastic ones. That was my main disappointment. Please let me know when there are lids available that aren’t nearly as hard to use, especially when you are 68 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C.

customer_reviews.title: Useless Tupperware product
customer_reviews.text: I would have really liked this product if the lids had come with it. The cannisters are pretty useless without the lids as you cannot put anything in them. It would be great if you could somehow manage to send me the lids. And I really like Tupperware products. I have used them all my life and would really like to use these cannisters.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn D. Schmahl

customer_reviews.title: Great product -- better than ever!
customer_reviews.text: Tupperwear is just as strong and useful today as it was in the past! Haven't had to replace many things, since they are so sturdy, so it had been years since I ordered new containers! Recently moved to another state and gave away my old flour and sugar holders, so am really enjoying these new ones in my new home!
customer_reviews.author: P. Hofmeister

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I received these and found that they are as described. The lids worked great...several reviews complained about the lid - but I had no issues. All lids accounted for and working great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Norman H.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I now have 4 sets of these. My first set was purchased about 14 years ago. I have a second home now and needed another set. They are good quality and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing dry goods. No ants in the sugar. No humidity in the flour.
customer_reviews.author: parksullivan

customer_reviews.title: Keep baking good fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Great storage for baking staples...however, the lids were difficult for these weaker hands to remove. Fortunately after checking them out, they were to be a gift for a young home maker. She doesn't seem to have a problem with the lids and enjoys how they seal up and keep things fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tupperware Canister Set from 30 years ago, so when we purchased our vacation property, I had to get another! Wasn’t sure if I’d like the new seals, but they’re great!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was thrilled with them!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and it was just what she wanted. They are well made and even though they are smaller than the set I have had for years, they were perfect for her new home!
customer_reviews.author: Moms Cooking The Books

customer_reviews.title: Covers need improvement
customer_reviews.text: Work good have to be very careful to snap cover on NEVER pick up by cover. I had to sweep up 3-4 lbs of sugar off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware Lover
customer_reviews.text: So very happy to see this 4 container Tupperware Canister set available online. Ease of use is exceptional. So much easier to keep clean than the older version plus it has an extra container for another item that you use on a regular basis. I have used the smallest container to hold nuts, lo-cal sugar packets, etc. The sky's the limit with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Kitchen Necessity
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Tupperware Canister Set for as long as I can remember. They are the absolute best and last forever. I have only replaced them when I changed my kitchen colors! This canister set keeps the food fresh and handy. I can't imagine my kitchen without them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi917

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Had to return them. One lid was missing and the lids that were there didn't seal right.
customer_reviews.author: asherry

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and clean looking
customer_reviews.text: These canisters are sleek and clean looking. The seal is nice and tight. The lid has a lip that allows easy opening. I'm happy with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If these canisters are anything like my many pieces of Tupperware
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present, so I can't comment on the actual product. If these canisters are anything like my many pieces of Tupperware, that I have had for decades, then they will probably last forever and look great!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Philipp

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware canister are always dependable.
customer_reviews.text: The canisters will coordinate with my remainder canister with the hunter green lids. I love that they can be stacked on top of each other,
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Dally

customer_reviews.title: Quality Tupperware Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great Tupperware Quality, really like the upgraded see-through window just in case I forget what was in the container. The lid snaps together for a great seal.
customer_reviews.author: volksman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can see what is in the container without having to open it. Use it for my baking ingredients and keeps them fresh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these canisters
customer_reviews.text: Love these canisters. The lids have a good seal, and are easy to open. The viewing window on the canisters is an added bonus.They look clean and trendy in our pantry!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Son
customer_reviews.text: It was given as a gift. My son loved them. He said they are better then the ones I have.
customer_reviews.author: marisol

customer_reviews.title: Good but......
customer_reviews.text: Would have been great but one lid didn’t for and they are super hard to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware tried and true
customer_reviews.text: For 45 years I have turned to Tupperware for my storage and never been disappointed...the quality has remained the same.
customer_reviews.author: Schatzi07

customer_reviews.title: No Lids - just the containers
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with lids like said it would. So have to return and ended up buying from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. It arrived on time. As with all Tupperware, it is excellent quality. I store potato chips, nuts, and other bagged items to prevent them from going stale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have an older set of these without the window that I have been very pleased with. Love these even more with the peakabool window to help remind me what is in them or if it is empty. Glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: JASON T FLORA

customer_reviews.title: These are great. The new lids are much tighter than my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The new lids are much tighter than my old set of 30 years use. Now I need to get black tops for the old canisters so all will match, since they are still usable too. I also appreciate the little windows to allow me to check on the amount I have left.
customer_reviews.author: Gran Nana

customer_reviews.title: Great product as always!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved her gift! She wanted a set like mine, but hers have windows and mine don't. That way you know when you are getting low!
customer_reviews.author: Martha W.

customer_reviews.title: ... her hope chest because they are by far the best canisters I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have three sets of these for myself and my youngest is going off to college and ask for a set for her hope chest because they are by far the best canisters I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Anita M.

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty awesome. They seal air tight
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty awesome. They seal air tight, the little peak holes let you know when you are low, and they are so simple.
customer_reviews.author: sarah diana

customer_reviews.title: As an elderly customer very dissatisfied with the new tupperware ...
customer_reviews.text: As an elderly customer very dissatisfied with the new tupperware canisters our arthritic hands are unable to get lids off our set I miss the old type
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B Hasley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the new design lip. Makes it a lot easier to to open and burp the container.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen is black and gray so it matches nicely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this canister set ever since it came out!! I still prefer the old design
customer_reviews.author: Dee A Shepard

customer_reviews.title: I love the set but I could not open the lids
customer_reviews.text: I love the set but I could not open the lids! I asked several other people to try but with the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Don Krebs

customer_reviews.title: I love my Tupperware One Touch canister set
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tupperware One Touch canister set. I have always been a fan of Tupperware and have lots and lots of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible!! I can't even get the lids on and off!!!
customer_reviews.author: natalie williams

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware
customer_reviews.text: Love my new canisters! Lids fit great! I will be ordering more soon!
customer_reviews.author: amanda hutton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers, they even hold up to my cat knocking them off of the counters.
customer_reviews.author: Roni Ware

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The newly designed lids do not seal like the old lids; they are much lower quality.
customer_reviews.author: BobSatx

customer_reviews.title: not like her old orange ones from the past
customer_reviews.text: Lids are too hard to remove for 70+ mother, not like her old orange ones from the past. Hoping they will break in, soon!
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: It's very easy to close and open
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to close and open. The lids will be much easier to clean compared to the old style.
customer_reviews.author: 💄👠🎂👗👒👑👜🎡💐💍

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't like the old Tupperware. This set seems cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Lids Included
customer_reviews.text: Received the Cannisters but no lids/seals were enclosed. Returning for Refund...
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Yee

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a terrible purchase. I wish I had taken it out of the box sooner as now it's too late to return it. I can't even get the lid to close on the medium sized one. I used to sell Tupperware, and all our products we sold were made in the US. Shame on me for not going to straight to an authorized distributor.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda D. Yaffe

customer_reviews.title: No, I don't work for Tupperware...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful canisters! What's not to love about Tware?! Since moving to Arizona I have not been able to keep brown sugar soft...yes, I tried the clay disc, the slice of bread, the apple slice and everything else recommended. Ended up with great tasting stuff food stuffed around the brick of sugar. These are air tight. Nothing's getting in these! It's better to just pay the money for the real thing and be done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lefebvre

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware One Touch Canister Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old Tupperware set I bought probably 20 years ago!! I love my Tupperware but to be able to see what was inside was an added bonus!! If this last 20 years like my first set, this will be the last set I have to buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy P Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: Already used tupperware canisters but could not get replacement lid and two had worn out. Love the new black lid and see thru canister. Easy to see in and to keep clean. Very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: C. Belding

customer_reviews.title: Best cannisters
customer_reviews.text: I’m a former Tupperware dealer. Needed some more canisters for different kinds of flour and other stuff. The second smallest has a seal that is very hard to click on. I finally get it to work, but is frustrating. Thus only 4*.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Good Canisters
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find a replacement for my old Tupperware cannisters. The lids are easy to get on and off if you follow the directions and push down in the middle while lifting the edge. Are dishwasher safe and came out clean and without any problems. Glad I ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: M in MD

customer_reviews.title: Extremely difficult lids
customer_reviews.text: I love Tupperware, but have never owned any that was as difficult as this set was. Our of the 4 piece set, I could only get the lid on one of the containers. But then I could not get the lid off. I had to get my hubby to do that, and it was difficult for him. If there was anything in the canister, it would have gone all over the kitchen. I have returned them and am quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sailing

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love these and will be ordering more in the future. The lid fits tight and if you take it off the proper way, it's not hard to remove at all. Just a little pressure after lifting the extended part of the lid and there you go.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Engel

customer_reviews.title: Beware -- this is not your old reliable Tupperware!
customer_reviews.text: So stiff and cheaply made -- not like the old Tupperware. I had a hard time fitting the lids onto the cannisters and an even worse time trying to open them! Broke a fingernail opening one! My return window closed and I guess we'll use them in the garage as open containers because I'll never want to try closing or opening them again!
customer_reviews.author: Georgette

customer_reviews.title: Love this set..
customer_reviews.text: I would buy again I have mine on my kitchen counter. they are durable easy to use air tight. and they look so nice. good buy.
customer_reviews.author: elsie riggs

customer_reviews.title: Love them. I had the old 70's poppy set ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I had the old 70's poppy set but was reluctant to purcase a new set because of the lid design. I decided to purchase them when I saw that they had changed the lids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The lids do not fit properly
customer_reviews.text: Did not use these when I first got them so I cannot return them. Am so disappointed that these are sold as a tupperware product. Tupperware used to be good quality. The lids do not seal well on these
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware Cannisters Covers do not all fit
customer_reviews.text: Cover C does not fit. A couple of others are a little difficult to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Zac's Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent containers.
customer_reviews.text: These replace an old set I have had for many years. Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Durable tupperware.
customer_reviews.text: Durable containers that wash well. The view window on side of canistwr displays contents very well.
customer_reviews.author: CinnamonGurl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One of the lids do fit i need to return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly new condition. My mom had been wanting this set and it was sn Xmas present. She was thrilled! Definitely would buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! Tupperware is the best! They look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Storee

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware the best
customer_reviews.text: I love Tupperware truly the best plastic products I've some of the old products from the eighties.
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia55

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This product is good. Seals tight. Easy to open and nicely stacks.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like this set. It's Tupperware so it is very strong. I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bronx Lady 24

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat tupperware
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the canisters. Hope they still last as long as the old Tupperware.
customer_reviews.author: Tony G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the originals - I have had some for 20 years
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Wilson, PhD

customer_reviews.title: Best canisters set out there
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep baking ingredients fresh at the cottage.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: New set after 40 years
customer_reviews.text: I just love them, give my daughter my old set👍
customer_reviews.author: Redonthehead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, however the larger one-seems that the lid is not as tight fitting as the others.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs H

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for and it matches so ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and it matches so well in our kitchen. So far we've had it for two months of actual use and it's holding up well. I expect it to last forever! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Tupperware, I like how tight the lids fit
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Aguiar

customer_reviews.title: I love Tupperware
customer_reviews.text: I replaced ceramic canisters with these, they are durable and seal to keep the contents fresh and protected. They arrived early and had a surprise gift included in the shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Its Tupperware
customer_reviews.text: I don't like these as much as the older style plastic canisters. They are a more rigid plastic. But they are good quality and they will certainly do.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great Canister Set
customer_reviews.text: It is a great canister set and I know since it's Tupperware it will last a lifetime. Looks great in my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Anita Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: these are great- I keep them in my pantry- easy to see when you are running low
customer_reviews.text: these are great- I keep them in my pantry- easy to see when you are running low. Airtight tops which are easy to remove
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

product_meta.title: TUPPERWARE ONE TOUCH REMINDER 4-PC. CANISTER SET/BLACK WITH NEW DESIGNED SEALS
product_meta.description: TUPPERWARE ONE TOUCH REMINDER 4-PC. CANISTER SET/BLACK WITH NEW DESIGNED SEALS
feature_bullets: Newly designed seal for easier use! Organize your family's favorite snacks and after school treats. Viewing window at the bottom of the canister serves as a reminder when you're running low.
Includes 5-cup/1.2 L Junior, 8-cup/1.9 L Small and 12-cup/2.8 L Medium and 17½-cup/4 L Large canister
Snow White Canisters with viewing window at bottom and Black Newly Designed seals.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars179 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Lifetime warranty against chipping, cracking, peeling, breaking during non-commercial use.
